noun.description: A narrow strip of leather or other material, used especially as a fastening or as the lash of a whip.
A skimpy bathing suit or pair of underpants like a G-string.
examples: by day it's miniskirts and by the pool thong bikinis

verb.description: Flog or lash (someone) with a whip.

origin: Old English thwang, thwong, of Germanic origin; related to German Zwang compulsion. Compare with whang.
